section.name: Release Description
section.p: The Release Description Documents (RDDs) detail the new and modified capabilities that comprise a particular TIE System release. These documents will also describe any impact that the new or modified capabilities will have on TIE operations, data providers and data consumers.

ul.li:
Version: 0.3.0
Date: 2014-04-11
Description: This release of TIE System includes minor updates to the release 0.2.0c.

Version: 0.2.0c
Date: 2013-12-08
Description: This release of TIE System includes minor updates to the release 0.2.0b.

Version: 0.2.0b
Date: 2013-11-05
Description: This release of TIE System includes minor updates to the release 0.2.0a.

Vesion: 0.2.0a
Date: 2013-10-01
Description: This is the initial release of TIE System.
